post:
Hello HostedTalk-community,

TRY AN ALWYZON PERFORMANCE SERVER E8 FOR JUST 1 €; NO COMMITMENT/CANCEL ANYTIME!

Although some announcements and offers have been posted on HostedTalk before, we have not been much present here with our VPS brand Alwyzon so far. Let us change that with a HostedTalk-exclusive introductory deal: try our flagship product line based on Intels high-clock E-2100/2200 CPU series for just 1 € for the 1st month and no commitment to renew at full price.

Grab the chance to convince yourself of our reliable uptime, our own low-latency network or just the power of an Intel Xeon E-2174G CPU (you will never ask for any Ryzens again ) for the price of less than a cup of coffee!

Not enough? The first customer that posts their order number and few words of their first impression gets a second month for free on top!

 

Virtual Server E⁸
24,96 € per month
1,– € for the 1st month

✓ 8 GB DDR4 ECC Memory
✓ 2 vCore Xeon® E-2174G @3,8+ Ghz
✓ 400 GB SDD (RAID 10)
✓ 50 TB Monthly Bandwidth
✓ Located in Vienna, AT
✓ 1x IPv4 + /64 IPv6 included
✓ Up to 1 Gbps Up-/Downlink

Coupon Code: GB7FL7UGLTI5V
(All prices excl. VAT, if applicable)

Limited to 10 orders or the latest of 2021-09-06; max one usage per customer.

 

Key Features

✓ Instant provisioning of new servers
✓ Easy to use client area (reboot, reinstall, VNC console)
✓ Reverse DNS configurable over client area too
✓ AlmaLinux, CentOS, Debian, openSUSE or Ubuntu pre-installed
✓ Or: upload and install your own ISOs in the client area
✓ Latest enterprise-grade hardware from major brands
✓ Located on the InterXion campus in Vienna, Austria
✓ Low-latency network in the heart of Europe
✓ Redundant, UPS-backed power supply (2N)
✓ Generators with initial autonomy of 72 hours

About Alwyzon

Alwyzon, is a trading name of Hohl IT e.U., a small privately-owned software development company registered in Graz, Austria and full member of the RIPE NCC. All equipment runs on our own infrastructure at the InterXion campus in Vienna, the largest internet hub in Austria. The network is connected directly to the Vienna Internet Exchange, has peerings with over 120 local ISPs and datacenters from AT , BA , CH , CZ , DE , HR , RS , SI , SK & more and receives network transit from RETN & Voxility for excellent connectivity all over the globe.

About the Network

• Looking Glass: alwyzon.com/lg/vie
• Test IPv4: 86.106.182.189
• Test IPv6: 2a0d:f302:106::6
• Test Download File: 25 MB 50 MB 100 MB

Frequently Asked Questions

How can I get this trial?
Visit www.alwyzon.com, scroll down to the Virtual Server E8, click “Order Now” and paste the coupon GB7FL7UGLTI5V into the order form. If the order form complains about “not valid for this product/configuration”, make sure to select “Billing Cycle: Monthly” first.

Is this a recurring deal?
No, the goal of this promotion is to lower the entry barrier for new customers to try our services. There is no obligation to continue to use the server after the first month, but this is not a recurring deal.

What payment methods do you support?
You can pay via Credit Cards*, AliPay, BanContact, giropay, iDeal, Przelewy24 and Paypal. If none of these payment methods is available to you, open a support ticket to pay via SEPA wire transfer.

*We know your credit card information is very sensitive and thus we will never store your credit card details on our servers. Instead, those are handled by the payment processor Stripe and we only store a token and the last four digits for later reference.

How long until my virtual server is ready to use?
Provisioning of new virtual servers is fully automated and takes about 5 minutes. As soon as your payment is received, the setup process is automatically launched for the operating system you selected in the checkout form. (Provided that our system didn’t flag you for manual review.)

What kinds of usages are accepted?
In short: keep it legit and don’t abuse the provided resources. No email spam, no file sharing, no Tor nodes, no Torrent and nothing that will hammer the shared CPU cores to 100% 24/7 (= no crypto currency miners, please). For a more detailed list, see the “Accepted Usage Policy” section of our Terms of Service.

What operating systems are supported?
You can either pick from the latest AlmaLinux, CentOS, Debian, openSuse or Ubuntu releases pre-installed on your virtual server; or you can upload any ISO and install whatever operating system you would like to use instead.

What level of support is provided?
These are unmanaged virtual server, so you are expected to install and configure the server yourself. You get root access to the virtual server and a Linux distribution pre-installed, but you will have to setup any software according to your requirements.

Do you have a bench?
Sure, of course. Here is the obligatory YABS:
